headline: PROCESS TECHNOLOGY HCQ12
specstable:
Manufacturer Process Technology
Model HCQ12
Description Infrared Chemical Heater
Accessories Compatible liquids:
  • SCI solution
  • SC2 solution
  • Sulfuric acid
  • Phosphoric acid
  • DI Water
Other Information Full Model HCQ12-240-1-001-20
Controller Model CHCQ60-240-1-001-01
Heater specifications:
Heater power: 12KW
Temperature limit: up to 200°C
Temperature controll: ±1.0°C
Flow rate: From 3.75 L/M to 35 L/M
Heat up time: 2.5°C/m
Pressure rating: 50 psig
Heater housing: 100% PTFE
Heating element: IR. Halogen lamps
Wetted surfaces: GE Type 214 quartz
Cooling vent outlet: 1/2" PFA male flare connector
Inlet/outlet: 1/2" quartz flare connection
Heater: 10"W x 19"D x 8"H
Controller: 17"W x 17"D x 8"H
Condition Very Good
Weight 49 lb (22 kg)
